meanings.sent1: After realizing the mistake, she decided to relist the item for sale.
meanings.sent2: The realtor will be relisting the house on the market next week.
meanings.sent3: The online seller accidentally deleted the post and had to relist it, causing a bit of frustration.
meanings.sent4: He felt like relisting his goals, giving them a fresh start and renewed focus.
meanings.sent5: The teacher encouraged the students to relist their vocabulary words to reinforce their memory.

meanings.sent1: The relisting of the products on the website led to increased sales.
meanings.sent2: The relisting of the names in the directory was necessary after the update.
meanings.sent3: The relisting of the menu items caused confusion among the customers, who were used to the old layout.
meanings.sent4: The relisting of the tasks on the board made them seem more manageable and organized.
meanings.sent5: The relisting of the books in the library made it easier for students to find what they needed.
